__e: I remember a fatted calf, but that was a sensible animal.
And, you,... ..if you had come out of Egypt, you would've been destroyed in the desert,... ..with all those who worship the golden calf.
You, however, expose them to strange gods, to the calf and to the pillars of fire and cloud;
After that, everyone is waiting for the calf to come home and then, when it finally returns, do you know what happens?
Last night, at the restaurant I ate in, there was cream in the soup, the veal and the apple pie.
